remarks: The square function on nonnegative reals is monotonic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
resqcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lt2sqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lt2sqd.3 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
lt2sqd.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) $.
le2sqd $p |- ( ph -> ( A <_ B <-> ( A ^ 2 ) <_ ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
